SELECT
FROM snapshots s INNER JOIN events e ON s.id = e.snapshot_id AND e.name <> #{lastVersion} AND e.category='Version' INNER JOIN projects p ON p.uuid=e.component_uuid AND p.id=#{componentId} ORDER BY e.event_date DESC

select
from snapshots s where s.scope = #{scope} AND (s.id = #{snapshot} or s.root_snapshot_id = #{snapshot})
